mapper.select: SELECT PID, PSN, TIM, LCN, FCN, TF, FEE, BAL, ATT, CRN, XRN, EPID, ETIM, LPID, LTIM,TAC FROM ( SELECT PID, PSN, TIM, LCN, FCN, TF, FEE, BAL, ATT, CRN, XRN, EPID, ETIM, LPID, LTIM,TAC,rownum r FROM T_CPU_CONSUME t1 WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM T_CPU_CONSUME_ERROR WHERE PID=t1.PID AND PSN=t1.PSN ) AND rownum <= #{endNum} AND SETTLE_DATE=#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ZIP_FILE_NAME=#{zipFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE r > #{startNum}
SELECT count(1) FROM T_CPU_CONSUME_ERROR WHERE SETTLE_DATE=#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ZIP_FILE_NAME=#{zipFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
